About Me...

EDUCATION

  • BA - PHILOSOPHY AT SDU 2014
  • FIRST TERM AS A CARPENTER AT KTS 2015
  • PRODUCTIONTECHNOLOGIST WITH SPECIALITY IN PRODUCTDESIGN AT KEA 2017

Creative & Versatile Man...

With an education in philosophy, product design and carpentry, I strive to have a very versatile set of skills and I always want to keep learning new skills. I have a very big interest in everything that happens in the world of tech and I do believe that we’re going to solve most problems through technological advancement.
In my sparetime I play music. A hoppy that has led to, amongst other, Roskilde Festival and several tours, both in Denmark and abroad.
I usually get the things I want and I’m not afraid to work hard for them.

Bench in pine

Bench made in pine as a first project at carpentry school. With a original design and finish only by hand, the bench was my very first foray into materiel design.

Distortion 2013-2016

Distortion as a projectleader for 3 years, arranging live events for the Distortion days and conducting same events on the days. This is the very last day of a 80 hour work week.

Ipad stand

Drawn and assembled for a cosumer while working for Cotter. The stands are laser cut and the design is my own

10 year music career

Working as a freelance musician for ten years, took me, amongst others, by Roskilde festival, DR Koncerthuset and several tours, both in Denmark and abroad.

Shelf for herbs

Made in plywood as a project trying to bring the garden into the small Copenhagen kitchen. This particular one was used as a present.

Ring and box for it

Made in hand as an original. The box is oak and the ring is ebony, of course recycled.

Dinner table

Made in birchwood and of course as an original design. The legs is made from recycled materials, which is something I care greatly about.

NÛRNBEAR 2015-2018

Headlining for my own band NÛRNBEAR, for which I wrote and procuced the music. This particular picture is taken at Spot festival 2017.

Bench for mother in law

Bench made in pine as a present. The design is of course original.

Box for wedding ring

Box made in birch. The box was used for a wedding proposal and she said yes.

Stay True festival

A festival that me and some friends started. While working on the festival I was head of production.

Shelf for shoes

Made on a laser cutter and in bamboo. It still functions as my shoe shelf.
